Pre-Game Insights: The 1st T20I of the West Indies tour of Australia 2024 will see the clash between Australia and West Indies at the Bellerive Oval, Hobart on Friday, 9 February 2024.

The pitch is exhibiting slower conditions, causing the ball to not come onto the bat smoothly, thus posing challenges for the batters. With an average first-inning score of 145 in T20 matches, batting first is deemed advantageous in this scenario.
Friday’s weather forecast for Hobart anticipates cloudy conditions with a peak temperature of 22°C. Expect moderate winds at 18 km/h alongside a humidity level of 50 percent.
Australia’s Predicted Playing XI: David Warner, Travis Head, Mitchell Marsh (c), Marcus Stoinis, Aaron Hardie, Glenn Maxwell, Tim David, Sean Abbott, Adam Zampa, Josh Hazlewood, Jason Behrendorff

West Indies’s Predicted Playing XI: Brandon King, Johnson Charles, Nicholas Pooran, Shai Hope, Rovman Powell (c), Andre Russell, Romario Shepherd, Jason Holder, Akeal Hosein, Kyle Mayers, Alzarri Joseph
Australia vs West Indies head-to-head in T20I: Total Matches: 19, Australia Won: 9, West Indies Won: 10
